sys_ui_page.html:
var apps = new GlideAggregate("x_23746_batch_in_0_st_available_update"); apps.addQuery('available_version', 'IN', '${sysparm_app_versions}'); apps.groupBy('name'); apps.groupBy('level'); apps.orderBy('level'); apps.orderBy('name'); apps.setGroup(true); apps.query();

${gs.getMessage('The following applications will be upgraded:')}

  • ${apps.getValue('name')} - ${apps.getValue('level')}
    •
sys_ui_page.name: updates_to_install
